name: Wonderful You! A Book of Art & Encouragement
blurb: Know a wonderful lady? Brighten her day with this uplifting book. Perfect for teens, graduates, teachers & moms. Custom dedication.

name: Winter painting residency in North Iceland
blurb: A time for quiet reflection, creative flow & landscape painting in the ephemeral winter light. Every sponsor receives original artwork.

name: Fantasy and Dragon Paintings by Teal Newcomb
blurb: I am working on filling up my portfolio with more dragons, fantasy creatures, and exotic landscapes!

name: Wandering Stars, Elephant Paintings for the 21st Century
blurb: My new series begins with 10 paintings of elephants inspired by the myths and astronomy of our solar system.

name: Hybrid Creature Prints & Stickers
blurb: Digital prints and stickers of abnormally sensuous paintings by Nicole Christman. Bold textures and innuendoes permeate it all.

name: Vancouver Art Space
blurb: VAS : an open art  studio space providing supplies and equipment for the casual creative or the serious professional artist.

name: San Francisco 2030 Skyline
blurb: Composite illustration of the San Francisco skyline, with under construction & planned projects.  Prints & original painting available!

blurb: I will create an exhibition of paintings, expressing hope and renewal from my Vision Trip to Haiti, with Water Missions International.

name: YesLex original paintings— Art Fair opportunity in London!
blurb: I've been accepted to exhibit at an Art Fair in London! It's happening VERY soon— can you help me get the work (and myself) to England?

name: Capturing the Light of Central Pennsylvania
blurb: My goal is to capture the unique light and atmosphere of central PA by completing 10 new paintings each month for a year.

name: NOMADS - An Art Book by Shane Pierce
blurb: NOMADS, an art book that explores rambling dark figures in modern compositions mixed with contemporary noir.

name: Easel on Down the Road - 2015
blurb: Invest in my quest to paint a landscape in every state!

name: Loose & Fluid Watercolor: Learn with 2 Online Art Courses
blurb: Create watercolor paintings that sing with life & color through online, self-paced courses taught by acclaimed artist Angela Fehr.

name: Holding Back Birds
blurb: A painting about trying to hold back one's own inner nature. Fund this project and receive a print.

name: bitPaintr - A Portrait Painting Robot
blurb: bitPaintr is a robot that paints using a mix of artificial intelligence and my artistic direction. We want to paint your portrait.

name: Second Chances : 100 Rescued Pet Portraits in 100 Days
blurb: Horses, dogs, cats, and even turtles!  A custom watercolor painting of your rescued pet featured in my next book!

name: Jeff Miracola's Fantasy Art Acrylic Painting Technique Video
blurb: A comprehensive acrylic painting technique video in DVD format and digital download by world-renowned fantasy artist Jeff Miracola.

name: BIG HOSPITAL
blurb: Planning on getting hurt? Never get lost in a hospital again when you have a copy of BIG HOSPITAL on hand.

name: Queer Dinosaur: Journey As Destination
blurb: Creating a new series of 12 transhuman paintings and participating in 2 gallery exhibits in Sydney and Melbourne!

name: Daughters of Mercury

name: Elixir - Unique Suspended Painting
blurb: Visual Artist attempts to win heart containers with unique suspended Paintings.

name: A 2-month painting residency in Iceland
blurb: Goal: an immersion in the landscape of Iceland. Time to reflect, work and grow. All backers receive original artwork.

name: BIG CANAL
blurb: I'd like to complete a gigantic, weird architectural watercolor drawing and make prints of it

name: Drawing of the Day Exhibition
blurb: I draw something unique everyday. After 365 drawings I will exhibit the entire series at The Invisible Dog with your Help :)

blurb: A handmade art book and set of prints for anyone with awareness of asthma. Each copy will be signed, numbered out of 200 and unique.

blurb: A painting expedition to find the people and places that define Argentina and bring us hope, wonder and inspiration.

name: Adopt-a-Painting Project
